A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were a few things that took me out of the movie\, but after being emotionally wrecked by Rogue One\, TLJ was very much welcomed. I don't know if it deserves a 91% by critics\, but I feel that some people reviewing are being unnecessarily dramatic. It is not the best in the series\, but it is not the worst (bruh\, did you even see episode 1?). I found it thoroughly entertaining to watch and I was engaged the entire time. There are many things I wished could be different\, but at the same time the series is by no means ruined.
